text: I rivet my gunwales together through the side of the hull with copper nails and roves. It greatly improves the appearance and the strength. Paint with good marine primer, undercoat and at least one coat of finishing paint. WHEN an assortment of differently coloured materials are cut into a variety of shapes they can be combined by either making fabric pictures or designs.
handwritten_text: I rivet my gunwales together through the side of the hull with copper nails and roves. It greatly improves the appearance and the strength. Paint with good marine primer, undercoat and at least one coat of finishing paint. WHEN an assortment of differently coloured materials are cut into a variety of shapes they can be combined by either making fabric pictures or designs.
